Morphemic: im kardac’-ac girk’-ě šat hetak’rk’ir ēr.
Translation: The book I have read was very interesting.

Morphemic: Ani-n barkac’-ac ē ir ełb-or vra.
Translation: Ani is angry with her brother.
S/he is proud of his/her son.
Comment: information-structurally neutral word order. ē is a kind of focus marker and the element preceding it is focused.

Translation: S/he is proud of his/her son.
The ugly duckling will turn into a beautiful swan.
S/he is proud of his/her son.
a father proud of his son
the father proud of his son
a/the father proud of his son
Comment: maybe possible appositively with comma intonation: Proud of his son, the father ...

Translation: the/a father proud of his son
a father proud of his son
Comment: poetic use with ‘mi’ after the noun

Translation: a father proud of his son
Comment: poetic use or appositive with ‘mi’ before the noun

Translation: the father proud of his son
the father proud of his son

Morphemic: Novosibirsk-um ostikan-ner-ě jerbakalel en 10-amya ałjk-a or-ě t’mranyut’-er-i vačar˚k’-ov ēr zbałv-um.
Gloss: Novosibirsk-LOC policeman-PL.NOM-the arrest-PTCP.PERF 3SG.COP 10-year girl-DAT REL.NOM-the drug-DAT-PL sell-INST she was work-PTCP.PRES
Translation: In Novosibirsk (the) policemen arrested a ten-year old girl who was involved in drug-selling.

Morphemic: es ayn erjanik-ner-ic’ em ov baxt ē unec’-el tesn-el-u nman ankrkneli darpasapah-i xał-ě.
Gloss: I.NOM that lucky-PL-ABL I am wh.NOM luck it_is have-PTCP.PERF. see-INF-DAT similar unique goalie-DAT game.NOM-the
Translation: I am one of the lucky ones who have had the chance tosee the game of a similarly unique goalie.
The bus is without passengers.
The book is on the table.
a bus without passengers
a bus without passengers
Comment: stylistically marked (poetic) and information-structurally marked (contrastive focus on 'without passengers')

Translation: the book one the (a) table
Comment: 'on' is only possible as a postposition. Here, the first gen licensed by the postposition, second gen licensed by the modification structure.

Translation: the book one the (a) table
a big old white house
